statements: DELETE FROM UserEngagementData WHERE country = 'USA' AND engagement_score < 50;
DELETE FROM UserEngagementData WHERE age > 30 AND user_name LIKE 'J%';
DELETE FROM user_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 101 AND engagement_score > 75;
DELETE FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM Engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'Email' AND date_time < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'click' AND behavior_timestamp < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM campaign_engagement WHERE user_id = 123 AND campaign_id = 456;
